name: A to Z "Ocarina of Time" Quiz | Zelda Games | 25 Questions

questions.text: The letter "A" is the first letter in a Poe Sister's name.  What is the name of that sister?
questions.explanation:
Amy.

	Amy is one of the four Poe Sisters found in the Forest Temple.  You'll need to defeat her and get her flame to help bring back the elevator to the basement where you'll be able to fight Phantom Ganon.  Amy is the green Poe with the puzzle blocks.  She should be the third Poe you fight along the way.

questions.text: This "B" object is important during the Spirit Temple, but they're also used in a bowling alley in Hyrule Market.  What object is it?
questions.explanation:
Bombchu & Bombchus.

	Bombchus are rodent-like bombs that crawl along walls and ceilings.  You can get them in Hyrule Market at the Bombchu shop, or you can win them at the Bombchu Bowling Alley.  The only place you'll really need them in a dungeon is when you're in the Spirit Temple at the point where you need to create sunlight by blasting a boulder out of a wall.

questions.text: This "C" word is what the characters in the game call chickens.  What is this "C" word?
questions.explanation:
Cuccos.

	In the game, Cuccos will play quite a big role.  Sometimes, they'll be used to earn bottles, heart pieces, etc.  After a while, they'll even help you in your quest for the Biggoron Sword!  Don't hurt the little guys though; if you attack them enough, they'll fight back.

questions.text: This "D" person is the goddess of the Earth.  Who is she?
questions.explanation:
Din.

	In the game, "Din Fire" will be an important spell given to you by a Great Fairy.  "Din's Fire" is great against multiple enemies, and it's crucial to have before entering the Shadow Temple.  The other goddesses in the game are Farore and Nayru.

questions.text: This "E" character plays a major role in the game as Link's horse.  Who is this character?
questions.explanation:
Epona.

	When you visit Lon Lon Ranch as a child, Malon will introduce you to Epona, and she'll teach you Epona's Song.  In the game, you'll need Epona to help get Biggoron's Sword, to cross the broken bridge outside Gerudo Fortress, and to get you across Hyrule.

questions.text: What "F" temple has Phantom Ganon as a boss?
questions.explanation:
Forest Temple.

	The Forest Temple is located in the Sacred Forest Meadow and it should be the first temple you go to.  Inside, you'll be able to get the Fairy Bow, and you'll be able to fight the Poe Sisters, Stalfoes, Floormasters, and Phantom Ganon.

questions.text: These obelisks (beginning with the letter "G") are found all over Hyrule, and they'll give you interesting information.  What are they called?
questions.explanation:
Gossip Stones.

	To talk with the Gossip Stones, you'll need to earn the Mask of Truth by giving away masks at the Happy Mask Shop in Hyrule Market as a child.  If you try bombing the rocks or hitting them with your Megaton Hammer, they'll shoot into the air like rockets.

questions.text: This "H" item is found in Dampé's grave.  What is it called?
questions.explanation:
Hookshot.

	The Hookshot needs to be found before entering the Forest Temple as an adult.  To earn it, you'll need to find Dampé's grave in Kakariko Graveyard and race Dampé to the finish of a large obstacle course.  The Hookshot is basically a spring-loaded hook that will attach onto many things including wood, and targets.  It can also be used to stun enemies.

questions.text: These boots found in the Ice Cavern are needed to enter the Water Temple.  What are they called?
questions.explanation:
Iron Boots.

	After navigating the Ice Cavern, you should come across a room where you'll fight a White Wolfos.  After defeating it, you'll get the Iron Boots and Sheik will teach you the Serenade of Water which can be used to warp you to Lake Hylia.

questions.text: This large fish in Zora's Fountain is your third dungeon of the game.  What is the name of this fish?
questions.explanation:
Jabu Jabu.

	To enter Jabu Jabu's Belly, you'll need to use a bottle and catch a fish in Zora's Domain.  Once you place the fish in front of him, Jabu Jabu will suck you into his mouth and you can begin the search for Princess Ruto.

questions.text: This mask is given to the guard at the path to Death Mountain.  What mask is it?
questions.explanation:
Keaton Mask.

	The Keaton is a mythological fox-like creature in the game with three tails.  He doesn't appear in full-form in "The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time", but he appears in "The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask".

questions.text: This "L" object is found in the bottom of the well in Kakariko Village. What is it called?
questions.correct: Lens of Truth & The Lens of Truth
questions.explanation:
Lens of Truth & The Lens of Truth.

	When used, the Lens of Truth will let you see through objects that aren't really there.  The lens is very beneficial when playing the Treasure Chest Game in Hyrule Market as a child because the Lens can see through chests.  You'll need to watch out though, because the Lens will drain your magic.

questions.text: An "M" word is the type of shield you find in the Spirit Temple.  What word is it?
questions.explanation:
Mirror.

	The mirror shield is able to deflect attacks from some enemies, and it is also able to reflect sunlight on its shiny mirror-like surface.  You can find the shield in the Spirit Temple when you are an adult.

questions.text: The ________ of Shadow is a song that warps you to the entrance of the Shadow Temple.
questions.explanation:
Nocturne.

	To learn the Nocturne of Shadow, you need to beat the Forest temple, the Fire Temple, and the Water Temple, then you'll need to go to Kakariko Village.  The song will warp you to Kakariko Graveyard, and you'll need to open the temple doors with Din's Fire.

questions.text: What "O" word describes the mushroom given to you after you give Cojiro to the guy in the Lost Woods?
questions.explanation:
Odd.

	The Odd Mushroom is a crucial item in the trading game on the quest for the Biggoron Sword.  Cojiro is given to you by the Cucco Lady in Kakariko Village, and you give Cojiro to the man at the Skull Kid's log in the Lost Woods.

questions.text: What "P" word is what the characters in the game call ghosts?
questions.explanation:
Poes & poe.

	Poes come in many shapes and sizes, and they're usually found when you are an adult.  If you're on Epona, you can shoot and bottle Big Poes in Hyrule Field to earn a bottle, but you can also find Poes in Kakariko Graveyard and the Forest Temple.

questions.text: A "quiver" is the object that is used to hold your arrows.
questions.explanation:
True.

	In the game, Link can upgrade his quiver/arrow capacity by playing shooting games.  In the end, your quiver could hold up to fifty arrows.

questions.text: What "R" name is the name of the Princess of the Zoras?
questions.explanation:
Ruto.

	Ruto is usually in a sticky situation.  The first time you meet Ruto, you have to save her inside Jabu Jabu's belly, and when you do, she decides that you and her are going to get married.  As an adult, she is revealed as the sage of the Water Temple.

questions.text: What "S" object is given to you after you collect twenty Gold Skulltula Tokens?
questions.correct: Stone of Agony & The Stone of Agony
questions.explanation:
Stone of Agony & The Stone of Agony.

	The Stone of Agony is what allows you to use the N64 Rumble Pak.  If you pop the Rumble Pak into your controller, the controller will shake if you walk over treasure in the ground.  Your Gold Skulltula Tokens can be redeemed in the Skulltula House in Kakariko Village.

questions.text: What is the name of the boss from the Spirit Temple?
questions.explanation:
Twinrova.

	The sorceress twins Koume and Kotake make Twinrova in the Spirit Temple.  With their fire and ice powers, you'll need to use your mirror shield to deflect their blows.  After defeating them, you'll be able to get the Spirit Medallion from Nabooru.

questions.text: After draining the well in Kakariko village, a new dungeon called "Under the Well" will be accessible.
questions.explanation:
False.

	In the game, the dungeon is called "Beneath the Well".  It is there where you can find some Gold Skulltulas, Heart Pieces, and the Lens of Truth.

questions.text: What is the name of the boss of the Fire Temple?
questions.explanation:
Volvagia.

	Volvagia the subterranean lava dragon was awakened by Ganondorf to eat the Gorons on Death Mountain.  As long as you have the Megaton Hammer, the battle shouldn't be a problem.  You'll only need to watch out for fire and falling rocks.

questions.text: Which enemy can be found in the Forest Temple, Shadow Temple, and Spirit Temple?
questions.explanation:
Wallmaster.

	Wallmasters latch onto the ceiling and drop down you at horrible times.  If one drops on you, it instantly takes you back to the very beginning of a dungeon.  Wallmasters look like ugly, decayed hands.

questions.text: In the game you can find Yellow Rupees.
questions.explanation:
False.

	The rupees found come in colours such as green, blue, red, purple, and orange.  If you find an orange rupee, it has a value of two hundred green rupees.

questions.text: The ______ Tunic will let you breathe underwater.
questions.explanation:
Zora & Zoras.

	The Zora Tunic is given to you by King Zora after you thaw him as an adult or you can buy the tunic in the Zora shop.  The tunic is blue and it is crucial to have when you enter the Water Temple.
